sentence.Network_en: Therefore I'll none of it. Honor is a mere scutcheon – and so ends my catechism.
sentence.Network_cn: 既然如此,我也不要它了. 荣誉真是死人的铭旌.我这教义问答仪式也就此完成.

means.word_mean: 1. a flat protective covering (on a door or wall etc) to prevent soiling by dirty fingers
2. a shield; especially one displaying a coat of arms
